outputs.output_descr: Strengthened regulatory frameworks, institutions and processes in place for accountable, transparent and participatory governance at national and local levels.

project_descr: The aim is to improve English skills for those working in anti-corruption institutions to support the implementation of the UNCAC and the Iraq Anti-Corruption Strategy with emphasis on cross border investigations, and international cooperation.
project_title: English Language Training for Commission Integrity & OIG
